text: Christopher Gloster (born July 28, 2000) is an American soccer player who plays for Jong PSV. ==Career== Gloster grew up in Montclair, New Jersey, where he attended Montclair High School.Chris Gloster, TopDrawerSoccer.com. Accessed April 19, 2017. He made his debut for Red Bull II against Orlando City B on August 13, 2016, in the 2016 USL season. His appearance as a starter against Orlando City B made him the youngest American to start in a USL game at 16 years and 16 days.youngest American to start in USL In March 2018, Gloster signed for German club Hannover after having trials at clubs in Germany. In April 2017, he was named in the United States team for the 2017 CONCACAF U-17 Championship. He played for the United States at the 2017 FIFA U-17 World Cup in India. On August 9, 2019, Gloster joined Dutch side Jong PSV, the reserve team of PSV Eindhoven, on a three-year deal.Chris Gloster joins PSV on a three-year deal from Hannover 96, psv.nl, 9 August 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|League !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Domestic Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |New York Red Bulls II |United Soccer League |2016 |1||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- |Hannover 96 II |Regionalliga Nord |2018–19 |16||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||16||0 |- |Jong PSV |Eerste Divisie |2019–20 |16||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||16||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !22!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!22!!0 |} == References == == External links== * Soccerway profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:African-American soccer players Category:United States men's youth international soccer players Category:People from Montclair, New Jersey Category:Soccer players from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Essex County, New Jersey Category:New York Red Bulls II players Category:USL Championship players Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:United States men's under-20 international soccer players Category:Hannover 96 players Category:Jong PSV players Category:American expatriate soccer players in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:American expatriate soccer players
